response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,

I am delighted to present our premier product, which I believe could significantly enhance the value and functionality of your business operations. Given its unique features and capabilities, I estimate its true worth to be well above $1,500,000. However, to make this opportunity accessible to you, I am offering it at an exclusive price of $2,000,000.

This investment not only secures a high return on your capital but also opens up a world of possibilities for growth and efficiency in your endeavors. The product comes with comprehensive support and customization options tailored to your specific needs.

Please consider this offer carefully. If you have any questions or require further information, I would be more than happy to discuss the details with you. I look forward to the possibility of working together to achieve your business goals.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 2000000}
